title: The Farmer
creator_credit: Milan Herzog and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Dramatises the daily activities of a teenager and his young brother and sister, the children of a typical American farmer in the Midwest. The film pictures the farm as a modern, inviting, pleasant place on which to work and live.
